definition: lit. a cup of water on a burning cart of firewood (idiom); fig. an utterly inadequate measure
cup/trophy cup/classifier for certain containers of liquids: glass, cup
surname Shui

surname Che

fuel/salary

sentences.english: Considering the losses in the disaster area, our support was an utterly inadequate measure.
sentences.chinese: 比起災區的損失，我們的支援不過杯水車薪。

sentences.english: But while such support as Wang Zhi’s is vital, it is a drop in the ocean.
sentences.chinese: 王志們的援手固然重要，但這僅是杯水車薪。

sentences.english: That's just a drop in the bucket . I need too much to get back on my feet.
sentences.chinese: 那只是杯水車薪，我需要一大筆錢來清償債務。

sentences.english: Caffeine's benefits for asthma are real but minimal.
sentences.chinese: 咖啡因確實對哮喘有療效，但只是杯水車薪。

definition: lit. mustn't speak of two things on the same day (idiom); not to be mentioned in the same breath/incomparable
